headline.main: GIRAUD SEES TUNISIA WON WITHIN MONTH; General Depicts the France He Hopes For After War, With Labor in Large Role GIRAUD SEES AFRICA WON WITHIN MONTH

lead_paragraph: ALGIERS, May 2 -- General Henri Honore Giraud predicted today that the Tunisian campaign would be concluded this month and that the war would end in 1944.
abstract: Giraud presents merit ctfs to 60 workers, Algiers
snippet: ALGIERS, May 2 -- General Henri Honore Giraud predicted today that the Tunisian campaign would be concluded this month and that the war would end in 1944....

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
